website_development.name: RecipeRover
website_development.description: RecipeRover is a web app that helps users discover and explore new recipes based on their dietary preferences, ingredients, and nutritional requirements. Step-by-step instructions and nutritional info included.

website_development.name: EcoMarket
website_development.description: EcoMarket is an online marketplace for eco-friendly products. Connects eco-conscious consumers with sellers offering environmentally friendly alternatives. Browse, read reviews, and securely make purchases.

website_development.name: TravelExplorer
website_development.description: TravelExplorer is a website for discovering and planning travel adventures. Browse destinations, find tips, book accommodations, and create personalized itineraries.

website_development.name: JobConnector
website_development.description: JobConnector is a platform connecting job seekers with employers. Create profiles, search job openings, apply, and manage applications. Employers post listings, review applications, and communicate with candidates.

ai_ml.name: HealthGuard
ai_ml.description: HealthGuard is an AI-powered health monitoring system analyzing health metrics from wearable devices. Provides personalized insights and alerts for potential health risks.

ai_ml.name: ChatBot360
ai_ml.description: ChatBot360 is an AI-powered chatbot for personalized customer support. Understands queries and responds with relevant information or solutions.

ai_ml.name: StockPredictor
ai_ml.description: StockPredictor is a ML model forecasting stock prices based on historical data and market trends. Analyzes company performance, economic indicators, and news sentiment.

ai_ml.name: ImageRecognizer
ai_ml.description: ImageRecognizer is an AI-powered image recognition system identifying objects, people, and scenes in photos or videos.

mobile_development.name: FitTrack
mobile_development.description: FitTrack is a mobile fitness tracking app for setting and achieving health goals. Track activities, calories burned, and workouts. Provides personalized plans, progress tracking, and social features.

mobile_development.name: BudgetBuddy
mobile_development.description: BudgetBuddy is a mobile app for managing finances and tracking expenses. Set budgets, categorize transactions, and visualize spending patterns.

mobile_development.name: TravelBuddy
mobile_development.description: TravelBuddy is a mobile app for enhancing the travel experience. Provides travel guides, itinerary planning, real-time bookings, and location-based recommendations.

mobile_development.name: RecipeSavor
mobile_development.description: RecipeSavor is a mobile app offering a collection of recipes from various cuisines. Search, save favorites, create shopping lists, and share recipes.
